- The avatar is currently at (5, 2).
- Nearby objects include a normal boulder (at (5, 6)), a master boulder (at (5, 4)), and various holes and floors around.
- To progress toward clearing the level, either the boulders should be moved toward the goal (indicated by '@'), or interactions with surrounding objects should be prioritized.

Next, I will try moving up or down since moving left or right has already been unsuccessful. I choose to move up to see if any boulders can be interacted with more effectively.

``` Action:4 ```
I expect this action will allow the avatar to approach the goal and potentially interact with nearby boulders or boxes in the next steps.
